name: Kura and the Snow Castle
description:
A Downloadable Visual Novel 

Synopsis

You play as Juniper, a lively ginger-haired girl with a love for the outdoors.
After having a strange dream about a castle of snow and ice, Juniper is determined to find what magic might be waiting for her in the wintry woods outside her home.

Features
  • Fully Voiced Characters
  • 5 Possible Endings
  • Original Art
  • Wholesome Feelings
Characters

Juniper: Our adventurous, young  protagonist.
Voiced by Jenna B. Brown

Kura: A mysterious boy with supernatural abilities.
Voiced by Riley Correia

Molly: An excitable toddler with a knack for art.
Voiced by Brittney Fredrickson

Bennet: A boy who dreams of owning his own bakery.
Voiced by Benjamin Robinson Hoppa

Mom: A kind woman raising three kids all on her own.
Voiced by Emma Welham

Windmonster: A horrible cloud creature with gnashing teeth.
Voiced by Brittney Fredrickson

Development

Created by KidBug.

As well as the rest of the Ninjam Productions team,  for your help with Sound Design (Josh Gehman) and for producing the Original Soundtrack (Sarah Lamoureux).
